messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] re:horde of unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Patrick!  I always wonder when I write Horde of Unschoolers, if I should point out the (not-so?) obvious that it is horde characters. But my inner imp came
messages.messageBody:
Hey Patrick! I always wonder when I write Horde of Unschoolers, if I
should point out the (not-so?) obvious that it is horde characters.
But my inner imp came out this time and said "don't do it". Glad
you did. ::::::scolds imp, to which it responds....Can't we all just
get along...::::::::

~Jill P

On Jan 3, 2009, at 11:04 AM, patrick morris wrote:

> the horde of unschoolers is of course the horde and not alliance , I
> know that seems obvious as I write this but it wasn't for I. hi jill.
> patrick



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
